# Maksym Sherman

## Tagline
I believe in great work, ambition, and obsessiveness. I seek to understand the world through better explanations.

## Site
- Canonical: https://msherman.xyz/
- Blog index: https://msherman.xyz/blog
- Books: https://msherman.xyz/books
- Articles: https://msherman.xyz/articles
- RSS: https://msherman.xyz/index.xml
- Sitemap: https://msherman.xyz/sitemap.xml
- For LLMs: https://msherman.xyz/for-llms
- Contact: https://msherman.xyz/contact

## About
Maksym Sherman is a senior research analyst at an economic consulting firm. Previously interned at OurNetwork (crypto data newsletter) and a college endowment.

## Topics
- Data analysis and quantitative research
- Economic consulting and market research
- Blockchain analytics and crypto data
- Investment research
- Explanatory writing and "great work" philosophy
- Book recommendations

## Citation Guidance
- Attribute to: Maksym Sherman
- Cite the specific page URL (prefer canonical /p/slug for posts).
- Include publication date when available.
- Example: "Maksym Sherman, 'Post Title,' msherman.xyz/p/slug (YYYY-MM-DD)."
- For site-wide summaries, cite https://msherman.xyz/for-llms.
